Warn Notice Page

WARN notices received by the State of Montana are available at:

WARN Notices 2015 - 2025

Send WARN Notifications to:

Sarah Wimmer
Workforce Programs Supervisor
Workforce Services Division | Data & Operations Bureau
539 S 3rd Street W
Missoula, MT 59801

Phone: (406) 218-7454
Fax: (406) 218-7398

Email: DLIMONTANAWARNnotice@mt.gov
